resources.string: So much languages supported. So awesome!

The child (called Baby Yoda) was born at 41 VSY and was apparently still an infant at the age of fifty, who was held by Nikto mercenaries at a facility on the planet Arvala-7. The Imperial employer hired a Mandalorian bounty hunter to get the child out of the facility and deliver it to the client. On the way back, however, the bounty hunter, known only as the Mandalorian, discovered that important parts of his spaceship, the Razor Crest, were stolen by Jawas of the desert planet, so they walked back to Kuiils ranch through the desert
